name: Uchu.io
description:
Uchu.io is a multiplayer spaceship game where you mine resources to upgrade your ship and battle against other opponents. You can build your ship using modular components such as thrusters, missile launchers, turrets, and reactors. Fighting against other ships will help you gain experience and level up, allowing you to build even stronger ships. 

Feedback

Looking for suggestions in regards to making ship battles more interesting. Maybe some type of free for all gamemode that's fairly balanced in a way that big lv.25 ships cant just easily destroy small lv.1 ships.
